snippet: Wang Jianlin, the chairman and president of Dalian Wanda Group, said the company's $2.6 billion acquisition of the theater chain AMC Entertainment was only a beginning.
abstract: Wang Jianlin, the chairman and president of Dalian Wanda Group, said the company's $2.6 billion acquisition of the theater chain AMC Entertainment was only a beginning.

headline.main: After AMC Acquisition, Chinese Mogul Sees $10 Billion in New U.S. Investment
